author: Aksedir
title: Playful but Tractor Trailer Disconnects Too Easily
review:
Playability is good, role play for fueling a tractor, fixing, loading, unloading, cow feeding, cow milking and some fun bricks.

There is not much to built, so building experience is limited. I

Title says it, trailer disconnects to easily, which makes it difficult for a 2 years old baby to adjust the right amount of power. On the other hand, I think it will help her to use her powers carefully. Still, a small touch to the trailer, and the thing is out.  

Overall rating would be 5 if they had found a better way to attach the trailer.
